name: Shrimp Orzo Pesto
author: M. Kertello
summary: This is one of my finest creations, made much easier by the frozen pre-cooked shrimp!
ingredients: ½ cup diced red bell pepper
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook orzo in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Drain and transfer to a bowl; mix 2 teaspoons pesto and 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil into orzo
Heat remaining 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil in a skillet; cook and stir shrimp, red bell pepper, and capers in hot oil until shrimp is heated through, 3 to 5 minutes
Stir remaining 1 teaspoon pesto, oregano, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper into shrimp mixture; cook and stir until combined, 1 to 2 minutes
Mix orzo into shrimp mixture; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and drizzle with olive oil
